step.description: Add a spin control, give it the name spinCountry
Add a second spin control to the component. Give it the name spinCity
Properties - Data Series
Data Source Type SQL
Connection string is northwind
Table is Customers
Field list property and set it to Country
Set the Order property to Country.
Check the Distinct property checkbox.
click Arguments
Click Insert New Argument. Define an Argument called whatCountry
Set the Value property of the argument to be spinCountry
Define a second Data Series called seriesCities
Also make this an SQL Source Type.
Set the table to Customers
Set Field list property to City
Under Filter put the following
Check Distinct.
Go back to the UX Controls page. Highlight the spinCountry control. Under the Spin List Properties find the Data series mapping property and click the [...] box next to it.
Set spinCountry Display value and Stored value to be "seriesCountry.Country".
Click OK and OK.
Go back to the UX Controls page. Highlight the spinCity control. Under the Spin List Properties find the Data series mapping property and click the [...] box next to it.
Set spinCity Display value and Stored value to be "seriesCities.City".
Click OK and OK.
Need to automatically refresh control, highligh spin Country control and click OnSelect property
Add this code to refresh the data series in seriesCities with a 10 millisecond delay
step.note: The timeout prevents the refresh starting before the spinCountry control has the correct value.
